subject: Alpine Skiing
Avalanches
Accidents and Safety
Deaths (Fatalities)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Headlines of skiers buried by avalanches and the recent deaths of a snowmobiler and a skier have overshadowed concerns about the risks of extreme sports and their impact on families.
snippet: Headlines of skiers buried by avalanches and the recent deaths of a snowmobiler and a skier have overshadowed concerns about the risks of extreme sports and their impact on families.
